Package edu.unika.aifb.foam.combination

Interface Summary
Combination Combinations are used to aggregate the output of individual rules.
 

Class Summary
Averaging All values of the calculated rules are taken and an average is built.
BestValue All values of the calculated rules are taken and the best is taken.
DecisionTree Through machine learning a decision tree has been built.
MachineLearn The results from a machine learned combiner are fed back into the system.
ManualWeightsLinear Weights have been set by an ontology expert.
ManualWeightsSigmoid Weights have been set by an ontology expert.
